game.name: Oceanic Rails
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Build, create and manage your island! Combine crops, animals and helpers with unique modifiers and upgrades. Play a farming rougelike, where each run has different possibilities, with challenging weather and week-end rent, or build you island worry free and create a beautiful pixel art world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build, create and manage your island! Combine crops, animals and helpers with unique modifiers and upgrades. Play a farming rougelike, where each run has different possibilities, with challenging weather and week-end rent, or build you island worry free and create a beautiful pixel art world.
